articles.title: Paolini outlasts Vekic in record-breaking Wimbledon semifinal - WTA Tennis
articles.description: In the longest Wimbledon semifinal ever, Jasmine Paolini became the first Italian woman to reach the final in the Open Era by defeating Donna Vekic in three sets.
articles.content: WIMBLEDON -- In the longest Wimbledon semifinal ever, No. 7 seed Jasmine Paolini defeated Donna Vekic 2-6, 6-4, 7-6[8] in 2 hours and 51 minutes. Paolini, who battled from a set down and twice a brea… [+6319 chars]
